artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne:
Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with a trifold hand-colored engraving of a half-moon table underneath a frame with a checkered floor on the left; in the center a woman in a blue and white gown with a pink fan and a white and pink hat with a brownish/purple ribbon and bow; on the right a woman in a pink and green gown with a green fan and a white hat with green plumes and a brownish/purple ribbon and bow
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Trente-unième Cahier, 20 Septembre 1788
